sierra_item_update_poller.desc: Polls the SierraItemService every 10 minutes and publishes SierraItemUpdate to the SierraItemUpdate and SierraItemRetrievalRequest Streams

sierra_bib_update_poller.desc: Polls the SierraBibService every 10 minutes and publishes SierraBibUpdate to the SierraBibUpdate and SierraBibRetrievalRequest Streams

sierra_item_retriever.desc: Reads SierraItemRequest from the SierraItemRequest stream, retrieves those SierraItem records from the SierraItemService, and publishes SierraItem to the SierraItemRetrieval Stream

sierra_bib_retriever.desc: Reads SierraBibRequest from the SierraBibRequest stream, retrieves those SierraBib records from the SierraBibService, and publishes SierraBib to the SierraBibRetrieval Stream

bulk_export_reader.desc: Reads SierraItem & SierraBib records saved in S3 and publishes to SierraItemPostRequest and SierraBibPostRequest respectively (Renamed bulk-export-reader)

sierra_item_poster.desc: Reads from the SierraItemPostRequest stream and posts SierraItem to the ItemService, S3, and/or other destinations

sierra_bib_poster.desc: Reads from the SierraBibPostRequest stream and posts SierraBib to the BibService, S3, and/or other destinations

item_service.desc: Creates, reads, updates, and deletes Item records

bib_service.desc: Creates, reads, updates, and deletes Bib records

discovery_store_poster.desc: Reads Bib and Item streams, transforms them into Resource record, saves it a database, and publishes to Resource stream

discovery_queue_manager.desc: Reads document URI streams, batches them, publishes downstream

discovery_index_poster.desc: Reads Resource stream and posts to ElasticSearch

resource_search_service.desc: JSON-LD api providing search & retrieval of resource data via ES

api_gateway.desc: Joins various microservices into a single cohesive api with central authentication & caching

discovery_ui.desc: Front-end app for searching, discovering, and placing a hold on research items at NYPL.
